column4: My WM is completely messed up.. windows don't redraw themselve correctly, don't minimize or switch desktops
also when a new window pops up it is under existing windows
when did this start happening?
hard to remember.. its been going on a while now
I did install nvidia's latest with a ppa
I don't think that did it tho
maybe you should disable compiz
I went to disable it and it says mutter isn't running
Sys > Prefs > Appearance > Visual Affects > None  ?
let me get you a screen cap
http://imgur.com/uoXdf.png
is this lucid?
yes
I would try removing the nvidia stuff, myself.  Thought... I wonder what mutter is
I needed nvidia latest to run sc2 in wine
well, it is easy enough to reinstall, and if removing works, at least you have narrowed down the issue
I tried running mutter --replace
what is mutter?
no idea seems to be a WM
Wow that was odd
try metacity --replace
mmm hm, I think mutter is part of gnome-shell, a metacity replacement
